name: Amsterdam Economic Board
goal:
The mission of the Amsterdam Economic Board is to sustainably enhance the prosperity and well-being of the Amsterdam Metropolitan Area. To achieve this we work together with the business world, governmental agencies and knowledge institutes, focussing on collaboration, innovation and growth.

Our ambition is for the Amsterdam Metropolitan Area (AMA) to have secured a position among the top 3 of Europeâ€™s innovative regions by 2025. We can achieve this by creating solutions for urban challenges that will contribute to the liveability of the region.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
